title: Horti Lucull(i)ani
description: An elite villa and garden on the Pincian Hill in Rome laid out originally by Lucius Licinius Lucullus ca. 60 BC. The present day Villa Borghese gardens still cover a portion of the Gardens of Lucullus.

properties.description: Representative location of the Villa Borghese based on OpenStreetMap. The modern park corresponds approximately to the ancient grounds of the estate.
properties.title: OSM location of Villa Borghese
